If you have changed your mind or are not completely satisfied with a product purchased online at Thomas Pink, you can return it to us within twenty eight (28) days of receipt of item(s) to obtain a refund by following the steps outlined below.

Products must be returned in their original condition with original tags attached in order to be accepted as a return. Products must be unworn, unwashed and in a resalable condition. Returned products must be accompanied by all packaging and any related accessories. No refund will be processed for items that are returned incomplete, damaged or soiled.

For hygiene reasons, we do not accept returns on boxer shorts.
